chapter.para: OBS is used to build complete product lines. It is employed for openSUSE and also for SUSE Linux Enterprise products.

section.title: Product Line Setup
section.para: Bigger products, like openSUSE or SUSE Linux Enterprise usually contain multiple media. These media must be kept in sync in various ways, for example for installation patterns, version numbering and other meta data. To guarantee this, OBS provides the product definition xml. Submitting such a product xml will create all necessary sources for meta packages and also all needed kiwi source files.
